articles.author: Joe Cook
articles.title: Anthony Hill named On3 Preseason True Freshman All-American - Inside Texas
articles.description: Texas linebacker Anthony Hill was named to On3's Preseason True Freshman All-American team on Tuesday, the only member of the Longhorns to earn the distinction.
articles.content:
Texas linebacker Anthony Hill was named an On3 Preseason True Freshman All-American team on Tuesday, the only member of the Longhorns to earn the distinction.
